document_data.name: Caraway
document_data.mainbody: '''Caraway''' was a flowering plant that produced a common [[spices|spice]] seasoning, caraway seed.
document_data.Availability:
Caraway seeds were sold through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]] for two [[silver]] pieces per ounce.

Caraway seeds were used for cooking in [[Cursrah]] of the [[Calim Empire]].
document_data.Usage:
Caraway-distilled alcohol was a potent drink sometimes carried by travelers the [[Great Glacier]].
*[[Elvish seedcake]]s were delicious treats imbued with healing magics, baked using copious amounts of crushed [[aniseed]], caraway, and [[coriander]].
*''[[Erase]]'' spell [[scroll]]s required a special type of [[ink]] to be penned with, created out of mixed [[giant squid]] sepia, [[acid]], crushed caraway seeds, a [[chrysolite]], and a [[black pearl]].
*Caraway had minor medical uses, possessing antacid and digestive properties.
document_data.Trivia:
*[[Patricia Caraway]] was a [[celric]] envoy at the [[House of Bountiful Harvest]] of [[Chauntea]] in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] ''circa'' [[1370 DR]].
*[[Spice Caraway]] was a curiously-named famous [[bard]], active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
